stories.text:
Get funded?

I created a few scripts to automate my personal take on music marketing and to market my musical releases. Observing my results, a few musicians asked me to do the same for them and I charge them for it. I am actually making money running their marketing campaigns and I am starting to think of creating a platform out this. I talked with a few music labels too and I got some excited people waiting for the platform to be ready.

The problem: I got a 9-5 programming job that pays the bills and I got a recently born baby, no free time (and no mental capacity) anymore to work on my platform, despite having people asking about the progress of almost daily. Also I have not enough savings to quit my job.

Dream Scenario: I would love to get some funding so I can pay my bills and dedicate 40H weekly on developing my platform.

Is it dreaming too much? Do you guys think it would be possible? How so? I’m open to suggestions.

Cheers
stories.title: How to get funded in this case?
